verbs.description: [ARG0: author murakami] [V: talks] [ARG1: about his library plan writing music] haruki murakami is planning an archive at his japanese alma mater that will include drafts of his best - selling novels his translation work and his massive collection of music murakami 69 began writing after graduating from waseda university in 1975 and his latest novel killing commendatore recently hit u s bookstores murakami said the archive and library project will develop as he contributes materials in the years to come and he wants to see it stimulate cultural exchanges the writer announced the plan sunday at his first news conference in his home country in 37 years here are some of his comments from the event haruki murakami writer tokyo waseda university murakami murakami library u s
